quotes.quote: Our great conquests will come to an end on the day when we learn to live like those whom we have vanquished.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.quote: All experiences are preceded by mind, having mind as their master, created by mind
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: curiosity is beaten out of us by middle school; if you retain that curiosity, You're a scientist. A scientist is a kid who grew up physically, but not emotionally, not mentally
quotes.author: Neil De Grasse Tyson
